text: (ai rasool) kya ye (ahale makka) isee baat ke muntizar hai ki unake paas pharishte (qabze ruh ko) aa hee jaen ya (unake halaak karane ko) tumhaare paravaradigaar ka azaab hee aa pahunche jo log unase pahale ho guzare hain vah aisee baaten kar chuke hain aur khuda ne un par (zara bhee) julm nahin kiya balki vah log khud kufr kee vajah se apane oopar aap julm karate rahe
